synopsis.text: When winter grips New Port City in 2028, amidst the backdrop of postwar rebuilding and escalating tensions over foreign cartel interests, a shooting incident involving riot police erupts during a demonstration. The chaos unfolds due to a cyberbrain infection unleashed by a notorious terrorist known as 'Fire Starter.' An elite independent unit, led by the formidable Motoko Kusanagi, is tasked with quelling the upheaval and seeking justice. As they delve deeper into the incident, they encounter two enigmatic entities: 'Emma,' the tin girl, and 'Burinda Junior,' the scarecrow man. As Kusanagi navigates the complexities of the situation, she finds herself inexorably drawn to the truth sought by these two mysterious beings. This thrilling fourth installment of Ghost in the Shell: Arise promises a gripping tale of cyber warfare, justice, and revelation.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
